author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LESLIE STRENGTHENS SLIGHTLY WHILE MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD ACROSS THE TROPICAL EAST ATLANTIC...
summary:
...LESLIE STRENGTHENS SLIGHTLY WHILE MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD ACROSS THE TROPICAL EAST ATLANTIC...
 As of 5:00 AM AST Sat Oct 5
 the center of Leslie was located near 10.7, -34.8
 with movement WNW at 7 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 985 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Leslie (AT3/AL132024)
